summary:
- **Dividend Announcement (Appendix 3A.1)**  
  - **Security:** SGP (Stockland Stapled Securities)  
  - **Distribution Amount:** AUD 0.172 per security (unfranked, 100% unfranked).  
  - **Key Dates:**  
    - Ex-Date: 27/6/2025  
    - Record Date: 30/6/2025  
    - Payment Date: 29/8/2025  
    - DRP Election Deadline: 31/7/2025 (17:00 AEST).  
  - **DRP Details:**  
    - 1% discount applied to volume-weighted average price (1/7/2025–21/7/2025).  
    - New securities issued; ranks pari passu.  
    - Eligibility: Australia/NZ registered holders only.  
  - **Tax Components:** Estimated details to be confirmed by 20/8/2025.  

**No other material information identified.**
